resources.string: My product was damaged/lost during the delivery. What should I do?
How can I make a complaint about my delivery agent or some issues I faced for my delivery?

Please send your customer details and Consignment ID along with a picture of the damaged product at 190104058@aust.edu. We will then look into the matter to investigate and get back to you within the next 48 hours. In case the parcel is damaged due to poor packaging or for not having precautionary messages on the packaging, KARU will not be held accountable. We also encourage the customers to check their products at the time of delivery to avoid all sorts of confusion.
We will notify yoy when something new and interesting is happening
